name: Named Editor Groups
description: Abstract away IDs by giving them a name!

auto-name-format.name: Auto Name Format
auto-name-format.description:
The format to use when auto naming groups (Build helper, Re-Group). Use {id} for the ID and {name} for the name.
<cr>Changes to this setting are NOT retroactive! That means changing this value while making a level will not re-apply the new format to the old IDs, which can and will break subsequent auto-nammed IDs!</c>

show-in-edit-level-layer.name: Named IDs Preview Button
show-in-edit-level-layer.description: Shows/hides the button to preview a read-only list of named IDs on the level edit screen
